title: Nirmal Pathak Ki Ghar Wapsi
overview: Nirmal Pathak was only three years old when his father left this village and took Nirmal along with him to New Delhi. 24 years later, now a grown-up adult, Nirmal comes back to his roots. Itâ€™s love at first sight for Nirmal in the village. Alas, within a few days he comes face to face with the stark realities of village life. He begins to understand why his father Mohan Pathak had left the village 24 years back. 24 years later, Nirmal too arrives at the same situation.
